title: Start11 1.2 adds taskbar ungrouping and more features to Windows 11
content:
Start11 is getting updated to version 1.2 today, and with it come a handful of new features for Windows 11 in general. Most notably, Start11 1.2 adds the ability to ungroup taskbar icons, as well as resize the taskbar, and more. Taskbar ungrouping was a feature in most recent Windows versions, but with Windows 11,

The post Start11 1.2 adds taskbar ungrouping and more features to Windows 11 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Stardock has updated its Start11 software to version 1.2, adding the ability to ungroup windows in the taskbar, resize it, and more.
